item.title: STAT 385 Midterm Review
item.description: This semester in Stat 385: Statistics Programming Methods I have learned a fair amount of technical skills. Although I entered this class fairly experienced with R, I have learned quite a few R techniques that I was unfimiliar with previously, as well as learning how to use Github Rblogdown. R Functions and Techniques Listed below are a few functions that before entering this course I had either only used sparingly or hadnâ€™t used at all.

item.title: Hello R Markdown 55555
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. 55555 Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
